abilities.name: Energy Burn
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard in order to use this attack.
